name: Webflow
natural_language_description: 这是 Webflow 节点。主要用于: Consume the Webflow API

authentication.name: authentication
authentication.natural_language_description: 参数名: Authentication | 默认值: accessToken

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: item

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: get

siteId.name: siteId
siteId.description: ID of the site containing the collection whose items to retrieve. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
siteId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Site Name or ID | 作用: ID of the site containing the collection whose items to retrieve. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression. | (必填项)

collectionId.name: collectionId
collectionId.description: ID of the collection whose items to retrieve. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
collectionId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Collection Name or ID | 作用: ID of the collection whose items to retrieve. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression. | (必填项)

live.name: live
live.description: Whether the item should be published on the live site
live.natural_language_description: 参数名: Live | 作用: Whether the item should be published on the live site | 默认值: False | (必填项)

fieldsUi.name: fieldsUi
fieldsUi.natural_language_description: 参数名: Fields | 默认值: {}

itemId.name: itemId
itemId.description: ID of the item to update
itemId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Item ID | 作用: ID of the item to update | (必填项)

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
returnAll.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return All | 作用: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit | 默认值: False

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit | 作用: Max number of results to return | 默认值: 100
